Title: Relates to the placement of school crossing guards
Summary: Relates to the placement of school crossing guards; requires school crossing guards to be placed on each of the corners of streets adjacent to public and private schools in New York City serving students in grades K-8 and on each side of streets with more than four lanes.
LawCode: Amd ยง14-118, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the placement of school crossing guards
